name: Grabby Game: Deluxe
description:
Play as Grabby, grabbing pegs and taking names! 

Grabbing pegs deletes them; delete all of them to beat the level! 

And watch out for the cool spots-- they send you flying in random directions, and they just might send you down into the water, which will kill you! 

[WARNING: Pegs do not yet delete themselves, and so the game doesn't yet end.]
